name: Welcome to the Tinderbox PlayAway Awards!
name_original: Welcome to the Tinderbox PlayAway Awards!
description:
The Tinderbox team have been amazing, working tirelessly behind the scenes to make PlayAway festival happen! 

So we would like to say a big thanks to each of them, and have an awards ceremony to show appreciation!

Huge thanks to James Morwood for helping us to make this game and filling it with lovely art! 

Check out his work as jctwizard

Tinderbox PlayAway Games Festival

Two-week festival featuring over 30 game designers, artists, composers, educators and others involved in games. Join us for panel discussions, workshops, demos, music performances, digital play sessions, game jams and more!

More info at tinderboxcollective.org/playaway
